actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the Monarch Wilderness, Sequoia, and Sierra National Forests, in the State of California.

summary.text: Designates specified lands within the Sequoia and Sierra National Forests, California, as the "Monarch Wilderness". Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to authorize hydrological devices and provide for weather modification activities within such wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Monarch Wilderness, Sequoia, and Sierra National Forests, in the State of California.
